content: Hey everyone, apologies if this is the wrong channel for this, I am fairly new to this forum. My startup is currently working on a clinically integrated supply chain management software product and is looking for a FHIR developer to help us translate supply chain data (via GS1 1D/2D Barcode) into a FHIR resource. We were envisioning a short sub-contractual engagement. If anyone is interested I would love to chat more!
Hi. Job offerings should go through @Grahame Grieve posting on Work opportunities
